Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: When the present coalition government was established two years ago, an agreement was signed between the Likud Party and the Labour that the chosen Prime Minister from the labour Party Shimon Peres will serve only two years afterwards Itzhak Shamir of Likud will take over.
